page.title: 20Domesday Surveyors..Sulgrave
page.content: All the work for this survey has been carried out by the children,parents and teachers from Sulgrave CE Primary School.We feel we must be one of the smallest schools taking part in the survey with only 18 children on roll. Those taking part have been; John Tims Zoe Kopp Tom Greatorex Lee Rance Dean Trower Robert Henn Rebecca Guppy Jeremy Greatorex David Tims. Louise Bryant James O'Connell Fiona O'Connell Tom Wootton Rachel Stone Louise Taylor Phillippa Henn Felicity Guppy Helen Tims Mrs Henderson Mrs Dunstan (Teachers) Mr Henn Mrs Tims Mrs Taylor Mrs Henn Mrs O'Connell Mrs Bryant Mrs Guppy (Parents) Our thanks to all who allowed us to quesion them and visit their homes.
